Kamarnya bersih. AC nya dingin. Desain kamar baik. Kamarnya cukup luas. Masih banyak space buat sholat dan menyimpan koper. Kasurnya empuk. Penerangannya baik baik dr lampu kamarnya maupun cahaya dr luar baik.

text:
Hotel Kyriad menurut saya, di antara hotel lain, hotel ini paling bagus dan nyaman di Banda Aceh. Lokasi hotel Kyriad sangat strategis, dekat kemana2 krn letaknya di tengah2. Dekat dengan toko souvenir, tempat wisata, warung kopi, tempat makan dan beberapa ATM. Ada Pizza Hut persis di sebelah hotel, dan KFC di sebrang. 

Hotel memberikan fasilitas free shuttle utk Shalat Subuh ke Mesjid Agung Baiturrahman (daftar dulu sehari sblmnya di resepsionis), dan paling saya suka adalah disediakan Al-Quran dan Sajadah. Kamar hotel bersih, kamar mandi luas utk uk standar deluxe (ini nilai plus buat saya), bantal & kasurnya nyaman. 

Di kamar 719 view ke Bundaran simpang lima dan bisa lihat suasana pagi dan sore hari di Aceh. Oiya dari kamar jg keliatan mesjid Agung Baiturrahman.
Breakfast so so lah buat saya. Kopi hitam nya enak, plusnya ada free flow Milo dingin (jd ingat masa kecil ada pembagian susu milo di sekolah). 

Sempat juga ke Cafe Daud, pelayanannya jg baik. Tapi memang Cafe mengikuti jam tutup buka sesuai aturan di Banda Aceh (ga buka 24 jam). Wifi nya lancar jaya. Hanya saja, lemari baju kurang besar.

Pengalaman pertama perjalanan agak jauh tanpa keluarga sehingga saya banyak dibantu oleh Staf Hotel, Pak Muh Zamroni. 

Dari saat cek in (+welcome drink), atur mobil utk jemput ke bandara (telp dulu ke Hotel utk pesan mobil jemputan, with additional charge pastinya), beliau jg mencarikan saya payung hotel yang saya pinjam dan saya bawa2 ke tempat wisata krn hujan. Semua pertanyaan dijawab dengan baik dan memberikan solusi, ngga digantung jawabannya, kalau tidak tau pak zamroni akan tanya ke manajemen/teman lokal kemudian diteruskan informasi tsb ke saya. Kalau ke Banda Aceh saya tidak bingung untuk cari hotel. Keep up the good work ya Kyriad Muraya Hotel.

text:
Kalo menurut saya sih hotel baru, karena bbrp kali k aceh blm pernah lihat dan menginap disini.

Tapi ternyata sdh -/+ 2 tahun. 😅

Hotelnya dari luar terlihat megaaaaahhh, pas masuk lobby jg mewah dan masih terasa seperti hotel yg memang baru.

Masuk lift dgn kartu akses. 
Masuk kamar jg dgn akses termasuk dgn listriknya.
Karena hotel baru sistem untuk menyalakan listriknya sdh menggunakan yg memang d set sendiri per kamar.
Jd walaupun kita punya kunci d kamar lain, kunci kamar lain tsb gak bisa d pake menyalakan listrik d kamar kita. 😅
Kereeeen sih, cm jd gak kaya biasa aja. Biasanya kan cm pintu saja yg d set seeprti itu.

Kamarnya lumayan luas, dan semua suasanajya masih terlihat seperti baru.

Kasurnya enak, bantalnya ada 4.
Dan yg gak ketinggal sdh tersedia Al Qur'an dan sajadah dimasing-masing kamar.

Kemudian untuk breakfast jg aksesnya menggunakan kunci kamar. Biasanya kan cukup menyebutkan nama kamar, dihotel ini berbeda dimana ditanyakan kuncinya bila mau sarapan 😅

Menu sarapannya jg variatif banget dan enak.
Design restorannya jg lmyan unik, dgn space yg tidak terlalu luas banget.

Recommended banget deh hotel ini..

text:
Saya check in pada Sabtu 22 Desember, pukul 22.00, namun kamar yang saya pesan yaitu Superior non smoking-single tidak tersedia. Informasi dari staff front office bahwa semua kamar type superior room yang tersedia adalah smoking room di hotel ini. KENAPA TIDAK DIINFOKAN SAAT BOOKING, KAN SAYA BUAT NOTE BAHWA REQUEST NON SMOKING ROOM. Setelah tahu kamar yang saya tempati adalah smoking room, saya minta pindah type kamar, namun katanya sudah penuh. OK case tsb bisa saya telorasi dgn penyediaan aroma theraphy di kamar. 

TAPI setelah tiba di kamar ternyata TIDAK ADA JENDELA. Walau pun ada AC, kamar yang ga ada jendelanya itu TIDAK SAFETY loh bapak/ibu management hotel tercinta. Mengingat Aceh juga termasuk kawasan rawan bencana alam, alangkah lebih bijak bila dipertimbangkan kembali kondisi kamar. Saya ngak habis pikir, seberapa banyak untung yang didapat hotel dari cafe yang posisinya ada disebelahan kamar yang membuat kamar2 tsb akhirnya tidak ada jendelanya, ketimbang kenyamanan dan keamanan tamu yang menginap. 

Awalnya saya senang mendengar Kyriad buka di Banda Aceh, mengingat service dan pengalaman menginap di Kyriad di kota lain jadi saya yakin bahwa pengalaman sama mungkin bisa saya dapatkan di Aceh. Ternyata menginap di hotel Kyriad Aceh membuat kapok saja. Lebih baik pakai hotel lokal saja yang sama besar dan gradenya dibanding menginap di sini. 

Untuk PIC yang bertanggung jawab pada promosi hotel, mohon untuk tampilkan informasi detail tetntang hotel, entah di website/dll bahwa KYRIAD HOTEL MEMILIKI HOTEL YANG TIDAK ADA JENDELA DAN SEMUA KAMAR SUPERIOR YANG TERSEDIA HANYA SMOKING ROOM. Jangan hanya FREE WIFI dan lokasi hotel saja yang dipromosikan!!!
title: The worst hotel I've ever been in

text:
Ini adalah luxury hotel dengan sentuhan keramahan timur, meskipun Kyriad Muraya Banda Aceh adalah city hotel. Akses internetnya bebas dan kencang tanpa repot dengan password. Toiletries lengkap, in room entertainment-nya berkualitas tinggi, dilengkapi TV LED screen 40 inci, kamar luas, air deras dan bathroom menjadi tempat yang menyenangkan.

Setiap pagi, acara sarapan adalah yang paling kami tunggu: plenty of high menu selections. Tersedia menu-menu internasional dan lokal dalam sajian prasmanan. Setiap acara sarapan seperti perayaan. Berbagai pilihan appetizer, main course dan dessert, dihamparkan di Alhambra Restaurant. Bila ingin menikmati acara lunch dan dinner, kita bisa order berbagai menu di Daud Terrace Cafe di lantai dua.

Kami suka keramahan front office dan penyambutan para staf hotel. Meskipun ini city hotel, tapi perhatian mereka pada tamu serasa di resort hotel.

Lokasinya strategis dan dekat dengan semua jantung peradaban Banda Aceh, baik dari peradaban lama maupun baru. Ke Peunayong dan Masjid Baiturrahman bisa jalan kaki. Dari hotel ini, suara azan dari Baiturrahman masih terdengar sayup.

Terimakasih kepada GM dan team yang membuat liburan keluarga kami berharga dan penuh kenangan. Kami merasakan Aceh dalam sisi yang paling menyenangkan selama tinggal di Hotel Kyriad Muraya Banda Aceh. Wassalam.

text:
Kyriad Muraya merupakan pilihan hotel yang paling menyenangkan di antara hotel lain yang setara di Banda Aceh. Selain memang karena perabotan dan fasilitasnya yang serba baru, lokasinya juga sangat strategis. Dekat dengan pusat kuliner yang terkenal di Banda Aceh, seperti Mie Razali, Nasi Goreng Daus, dan berbagai warung kopi yang bertebaran disekitar hotel. Selain itu juga dekat dengan berbagai objek wisata di sana, seperti Masjid Agung Baiturrahman, Museum Tsunami, kapal yang terdampar dll.
Pelayanan dari para staff hotel khususnya Bell service dan frontliner juga sangat ramah daan helpfull. Kekurangan dari hotel ini adalah : karena saat kami menginap hotel ini konon baru sekitar 3 minggu beroperasi, maka bau lem atau pelitur mebel baru nya masih menyengat, lantai juga serasa berdebu, dan membangkitkan allergy saya dan anak saya. 
Tapi secara umum, hotel ini nyaman dan Recomended.
title: Hotel Baru Dengan Lokasi Strategis

text:
We stayed for one night before a morning flight to Medan.
The hotel is very central right next to Pizza Hut and not as located on Booking.com.  
The room was spacious , well equipped  and had a comfortable bed. The bathroom was quite small but had a great powerful shower. A/C worked perfectly. 
The staff were very welcoming,  helpful and friendly. 
The buffet breakfast offered a good range of local foods.
The only down side was the enormous amount of light pollution seeping into the room despite thick curtains.  This was coming from the hotel itself and the streets around as it sits right on the circle. Also there was very loud music playing either coming from within the hotel or from a location  very nearby. Fortunately it stopped at 11pm. Maybe we were just unlucky that night. Perhaps a room facing the back of the hotel would solve these issues.
All in all it is a good place to stay if you want to spend time in Banda Aceh city. I would recommend it and would stay there again.
title: Good central hotel

text:
Kyriad Muraya is a nice hotel in a central location in Banda Aceh. I found the check-in process was very slow the first time around, the reason being the receptionist was staring at the computer screen for a very long time.   One wondered why.  This was happening when we were all very tired after a long journey.  We just did not appreciate the  unnecessary delay to get to the rooms so we could take a rest.  Five of us stayed at the hotel in 3 rooms on 2 occasions in July 2019 for a total of 4 nights, all with prior reservations.

The rooms were nice, well air conditioned, clean, the beds comfortable , the washroom is equipped with shower and a  modern bidet.  However the hall way was quite warm like it was not air conditioned.  Everything looked new.

Banda Aceh was hit by an earthquake of 9.1 on the Richter scale followed by a  tsunami on December 26, 2004, causing massive damage in the city and surrounding area and killing close to a quarter of a million people in several countries.  Most of the fatalities were in the Aceh Province. 

The hotel is only a short distance away from attractions such as the Baiturrahman Grand Mosque and Lapangan Blangpadang. The latter is a large square (lapangan) in which there is an aircraft monument and monuments to honour each of the countries who took part as first responders and in the recovery and rebuilding of Banda Aceh post tsunami.  On the west side of the square there is the monument of “Aceh thanks the World” on which the colourful flags of those countries are carved in stone .  On the southeast corner you will find Tsunami Museum which records the disaster.

Nearby is PLTD Apung.  This was a diesel electric, 20 MW power station barge, moored at the harbour but was ripped off its moorings and slammed several kilometers inland by the tsunami and was stranded at where it is located now.   It is now a museum.  Also nearby is a museum showing a boat sitting atop of a house.  Siron Mass Grave of the tsunami victims is located several kilometers away on the road to airport.  

Also worth visiting is Fisherman’s Port at Lampulo, some 4 km from the hotel, to watch myriad of fish being unloaded around 6 am.  The wharf is crowded with fishermen and fishmongers.
title: New hotel with friendly staff

text:
This is one of the newest hotels in Banda Aceh.  It is clean and comfortable with a modern style.  It had a good and varied breakfast buffet with both local and western food.  We stayed here in order to check out Banda Aceh and as a stop coming and going to Pulau Weh.  It was a very comfortable base for us.
      As far as checking out the town, we were willing to walk around a bit, though not recommended for the faint of heart (my husband is fearless…) because of the traffic, but another great way to see the area is to book a taxi driver who will give you a tour.  It is generally best if you decide what you want to see, though the drivers usually know what tourists like, but what you do for the time you have the driver is totally up to you.  And they are willing to take you to whatever you want and wait until you come out to go to the next site.  The hotel can make arrangements (best to let them know the day before), but even with specific instructions that we wanted an English speaking driver, the driver’s English was very basic (quite common outside major tourist areas).  However, with some pantomiming and pointing to things in the guide book, it was a great way to go all over.  There was a printed sheet at the hotel reception desk that stated the prices for a certain amount of hours.  Make sure to agree clearly with the driver before you begin.  We ended up liking the driver so much that we used him multiple days for various trips.
title: Very comfortable base for our exploration of Banda Aceh and trip to and from Pulau Weh.

text:
Decided to try a new hotel in Aceh near the city centre and I was impressed. I have visited and stayed at quite a few hotels in Aceh and this one lifts the game.
It does cost a little more, but the new amenities and attentive staff make it worthwhile. Though it was for work, and I was not in the room much it was very clean and tidy.
Check in was quick and easy and staff are always available to assist, and greet you with a smile,
The room was spacious and very clean. The bathroom was very nice and also very clean with a shower only, all bed linen was clean.
Breakfast was a buffet with an amazing choice of local cuisine and international food. Such a choice each morning was excellent.
I was located on the 4 floor, with a window facing the street, but it was still quiet and able to always get a good night rest.
There is a mini-mart nearby, and a laundry mat also when leaving turn to the right and follow the road around.
title: 2 night stay for work

text:
Kyriad Aceh was opened in Nov 2017. It is far better than Hermes where we stayed in our previous trip. Loved the simplicity of Kyriad Aceh. They took great care in providing hospitality during Ramadhan. How? 
1-sahur menu selection met our tastebuds..simple,yet appetising
2-Kyriad provided foc transportation to and from hotel and Masjid Baiturrahman for Subuh and Terawih prayers.

Why we rated Kyriad Aceh 5*? Some people may say, it's a new hotel so that's why we rated them 5*. Sorry to disappoint those who say so. Kyriad Aceh deserves 5* because they paid attention to "hospitality" and they delivered.
1-before arrival (through Agoda.com), we requested for high floor (done!), room with a view of Banda Aceh (done!), early checkin (done!),
2-quick access to room and privacy: room floor access using lift is a tap on floor access system as we entered the lift - the floor number is automatically displayed; a tap on room door system, the door lights up green - authorised to enter.

Well done, Kyriad Aceh! Keep up the good work!
title: Minimalist, yet fantastic!

text: Four days well spent at this new hotel! The staff were helpful and many spoke English fluently. The rooms are quiet with hardly any sound from the outside. The location is quite central in comparison to other big hotels: it is about 10-mins to the Baiturrahman mosque, and to cafes/restaurants nearby, about 15-min to the Ferry terminal at Ulee Lheue, and about 40-min to the airport. There is a restaurant onsite which is very useful, and the food is excellent (the Nasi Goreng Simpang Lima was delicious!). Breakfast is a buffet or you can also order eggs etc. They have designated smoking and non-smoking floors - so be sure to inform the reception desk at check-in. The rooms were spacious too with coffee/tea making facilities and complimentary mineral water. No microwave but that's quite unnecessary given that the restaurant is open long hours, and that eateries are around. Banda Aceh is a nice city and fairly easy to get around. Use Grab or Gojek to pre-book cars or motorbike transport.
title: Good hotel that is centrally placed - Excellent value for money

text: I have been to Banda Aceh many times and tried many hotels at different times at this nice city dubbed as the 'Verandah of Mecca' or Seramoe Mekah in local language. I have passed Kyriad Muraya Hotel many times in the past and decided to give it a try this time. I found it very convenient and located nearby Masjid Raya Baiturrahman. The facilities at this hotel I can say is world class like any other 5 star hotels I've stayed in the past all over the world. The nasi gurih for breakfast is superb and for dinner the soto and rendang was excellent. Most memorably, one staff Devi Laurensia is very polite, and nice to guests with a very professional tip top services provided. The management should nurture this one talent - a potential future star in hotel management, if properly guided. Overall, I'll give 6 stars to this hotel based on my experience staying here. Keep it up!
title: Excellent Service by Kyriad Muraya Hotel Banda Aceh

text:
6만원대 예약으로 1박 숙박했습니다.
쁠라우웨 여행 중, 반다아체 시내 여행을 겸해 잠시 머무른 호텔입니다.

부대시설(짐, 수영장)만 없을 뿐, 그 외 모든 조건(룸, 조식, 서비스, 위치)에서 만족했습니다.
시내 여행을 위한 최고의 위치(대부분의 관광지가 도보 또는 그랩카 소액으로 가능)이며, 룸과 조식은 인도네시아 타지역과 비교해도 가성비 최고였습니다.

강추합니다.
title: 반다아체 여행 시 가장 추천할만한 호텔

text:
Das Hotel war für unsere Zwecke gut gelegen. Der Service war toll und das Personal immer freundlich und hilfsbereit. Die Zimmer waren sauber und gut ausgestattet. An der Bar-Terasse gab es nette Live-Musik.
Hier lässt es sich gut aushalten.
title: Prima Hotel mit gutem Service

text: Wir hatten einen sehr schönen Aufenthalt im Kyriad Hotel. Das Zimmer war klasse und absolut sauber.Auch das Frühstücksbuffet lies keine Wünsche offen, war sehr vielfältig und enthielt u.a. regionale Spezialitäten. Das Personal war sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend.
title: Sehr empfehlenswertes Hotel

text:
Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt im Kyriad sehr genossen. 
Die Lage ist top, die große Moschee lässt sich zu Fuß gut erreichen. Das Zimmer mit A/C war sehr schön, das Bett bequem und es gab Wifi. 
Besonders erwähneswert ist die Freundlichkeit und Herzlichkeit der Mitarbeiter. Sudirman und seine Kollegen waren sehr hilfsbereit. Wegen Ramadan haben wir abends im Hotel gegessen, es hat ein bisschen gedauert, aber die Kokos-Lachssuppe war sehr lecker. Das Frühstücksbuffet war sehr gut und abwechslungsreich mit vielen lokalen Speisen!

Vielen Dank für diesen tollen Aufenthalt. Wir können dieses Hotel uneingeschränkt empfehlen!
title: Tolles Hotel in bester Lage
